Text.Name: RpgTower
Text.Title: Rift Between Worlds: Village of nowhere
Text.Desc: Mysterious gate hidden deep inside the Otherworld Rift. A place between dream and reality that has attached itself to this realm, where thousands of years of history have been condensed.

Text.Name: RpgQianKun
Text.Title: Rift of the Universe: Place of Desolation
Text.Desc: Mysterious Heavenly Abode in the Mini Universe, sealed by strong forces. Has finally opened up because of the Secret Codex of Taiyi. Something unknown is hidden inside.

Text.Name: RpgArena
Text.Title: Dojo
Text.Desc: Place where disciples come to practice and have friendly competitions.
